references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduced the ResNet architecture, which has profoundly impacted deep learning, setting a benchmark for achieving high accuracy in image recognition tasks that also inspires many spiking neural network architectures.

references.paper_title: Learning multiple layers of features from tiny images
references.reason: This paper introduced the CIFAR datasets, widely used benchmarks for image classification which are also used in this paper for evaluating the performance of the proposed SNN model.

references.paper_title: A million spiking-neuron integrated circuit with a scalable communication network and interface
references.reason: This paper details the Loihi neuromorphic chip, a significant advancement in neuromorphic hardware that directly impacts the practical implementation of spiking neural networks.

references.paper_title: Supervised learning based on temporal coding in spiking neural networks
references.reason: This paper explores temporal coding, a crucial concept in SNNs, providing insights into how information is encoded and processed in these networks.
